inputs.name: Input directory
inputs.description: Directory containing the files to process

inputs.name: Basename
inputs.description: Basename of the file to process in the input directory

inputs.name: State
inputs.description: Example: "A". EEG state to be analyzed. The program will look for existing analysis windows labelled as state 'A' (Eyes Closed)

inputs.name: Window length
inputs.description: Length of the analysis window in seconds

inputs.name: fmin
inputs.description: Low cut frequency for analysis. Example: "0.390625"

inputs.name: freqres
inputs.description: Fequency resolution for analysis. Example: "0.390625". The analysis will use a frequency band like this: fmin:freqres:fmax. The program will compare this interval with the interval that is obtained for the real frequency parameters of the signal and will match both of them

inputs.name: fmax
inputs.description: High cut frequency for analysis. Example: "19.11"

inputs.name: wbands
inputs.description: A string representing a 5x2 matrix of real numbers, where rows are separated by ';' and columns by spaces. Example: "1.56 3.51; 3.9 7.41; 7.8 12.48; 12.87 19.11; 1.56 30"

inputs.name: flags
inputs.description: A string representing 12 boolean values. Example: "1 1 1 0 1 1 1 1 1 1 1 1". flags(1) - 1 for calculating the Broad Band Spectral Model. flags(2) - 1 for calculating the Narrow Band Spectral Model. flags(3) - 1 for calculating the Spectra at the EEG sources. flags(4) - RESERVED, not used. flags(5) - 1 or calculating the Broad Band Spectral Model Z values. flags(6) - 1 for calculating the Narrow Band Spectral Model Z values. flags(7) - 1 for calculating the Sources Spectra Z values. flags(8) - 1 for calculating the correlations matrix bewteen all pairs of channels for each epoch. flags(9) - 1 for calculating the coherence matrix bewteen all pairs of channels for each frequency. flags(10) - 1 for calculating the phase difference matrix bewteen all pairs of channels for each frequency. flags(11) - 1 for calculating the frequency domain correlations bewteen all pairs of channels for each frequency and each epoch.flags(12) - Store the XYZ components of the solutions at the sources

inputs.name: brain
inputs.description: 1 indicates to restrict the inverse solution to only gray matter. Otherwise, deep structure (basal ganglia) will be included in the grid

inputs.name: pg_apply
inputs.description: 1 for substracting the Global Scale Factor (Geometric Power) from the EEG signal

output-files.name: Output folder
output-files.description: A folder containing the output files and a copy of the input files.
